overview: Fello and Marisa had been drifting apart under the weight of children, money troubles, and the strain of daily modern life in Mexico City. When they win a weekend in a luxurious resort, and the chance to compete for the money that would solve their troubles, the entire family must come together to win the prize. In the process, Fello and Maritza will learn that marriage and family is still worth fighting for.
title: What Father… Is My Family?
